name: Mission Control (kalechipps)
description:
Sometimes, Colt feels like his life is out of control.

In a futuristic world where commercial space travel is commonplace and humanity is exploring the cosmos, Colt is stuck working a minimum-wage Mission Control call center job back on Earth.

Things are put into perspective when he receives a distress call from a young pilot in crisis.

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 for the theme Out of Control and was submitted just past the deadline, oops :(

I made all of the assets (code, art, SFX, etc) for this game myself within the jam period! I'll be making a devlog soon, you can keep an eye out for it at my Youtube channel.

Controls:

Left mouse: Advance story, select dialogue options, interact with room

Space: Toggle notetaking pad

R: restart story

The game is sort of buggy as-is. Some dialogue has response options that appear in the bottom right; if you don't click one of these, you can run into issues. Beware.
